{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05069v1", "title": "Asymptotic behaviour of counting functions over periodic orbits of a
  skew-product map", "summary": "In this manuscript, we investigate the asymptotic behaviour of certain
counting functions, associated to the ergodic sums computed along the periodic
orbits of the skew-product map, related to a finitely generated rational
semigroup. The results we obtain here are analogous to a version of the prime
number theorem and the Mertens' theorem, in number theory, however, in the
setting of the dynamical system, under consideration, in this paper.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS,math.NT", "published": "2025-05-08T09:06:09Z"}
